episode_event_valentine_2023_ch0124_40_m:
Around the time Palentine’s Day was coming to
an end...
[Name:PlayerNickname ] approached Mallow.
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? What’s up?
Your apple pie was really tasty!
Ahh! You ate my apple pie?

The idea you had for your pie
was amazing!
Right? I was so confident about it!

Many things happened along the way, but I’m so
glad everyone enjoyed it!
It also gave me some confidence.

Did I tell you before? One day, I want to take
over my family’s restaurant.

I didn’t even think I was as good as my dad
or big brother, but I got a compliment from
Siebold himself!
Are your cooking skills legendary?!
N-not quite yet! I still need to improve a lot...
You can take over the restaurant!
Hehe, thanks!
Are you hungry, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Hmm... I see...

You only got to eat a small piece of apple pie
since you shared it with all your friends!

I bet it’s because you have a lot of wonderful
friends, right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?

If that’s the case...do you want to make an apple
pie with me?

Freshly prepared food is the best, and when you
make it yourself, it tastes so good!
Let’s start preparing! C’mon!

Hehe! I think this Palentine’s Day is going to
become a very delicious memory!
